title: Phil.Anselmo.MP3.Collection.[Pantera.Down.SJR.Viking.Crown.Etc]
description:
Philip Hansen Anselmo (born June 30, 1968 in New Orleans, Louisiana) is an American musician who is best known for being the front man for the groove metal band PANTERA and is currently the front man for the sludge/stoner metal band DOWN. Over the years Phil has been a part of numerous bands where he either sang lead vocals or played an instrument of some kind. This massive collection showcases his better known projects and involvements. Enjoy! 


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- 

IN THIS TORRENT: 

(Bands are in CAPS; albums have the year released next to them)
